file.fileData:
<#ftl output_format="HTML">
<@compress single_line=true>
query{
    node(id: "${returnId}") {
        id
        ... on
        Return {
            id
            status
            name
            returnLineItems (first: 5) {
                edges {
                    node {
                        id
                        fulfillmentLineItem {
                            lineItem {
                                quantity
                            }
                        }
                        quantity
                        withCodeDiscountedTotalPriceSet {
                            presentmentMoney {
                                amount
                                currencyCode
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            exchangeLineItems (first: 5) {
                edges {
                    node {
                        id
                        lineItem {
                            id
                            quantity
                            sku
                            variantTitle
                            product {
                                id
                                title
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            refunds (first: 5) {
                edges {
                    node {
                        id
                        transactions (first: 5) {
                            edges {
                                node {
                                    id
                                    amountSet {
                                        presentmentMoney {
                                            amount
                                            currencyCode
                                        }
                                    }
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
</@compress>
